skill.description:
Transform into a Lightcrusher that lunges forward to attack, dealing {0} Spectro DMG. Generate {1} "Ablucence(s)" on hit. When the "Ablucence(s)" explode, deal {2} Spectro DMG.
Long press Echo Skill to stay as the Lightcrusher, lunging forward and walking in mid-air for a certain distance.

CD: {3}s
